Text: Trump just had peaceful demonstrators viciously attacked.  No, Mr. President. This is not a dictatorship. This is the United States of America. Our citizens have a constitutional right to peacefully protest. It's called the First Amendment.

WARNING: Trump's orders to the military are Unconstitutional. No matter it's an open call for racial civil war. His 2nd amend talk was essentially call on whites with guns to standby to help. This country will burn now. Death will ensue.

The Trump regime declared Antifa a terrorist organisation and then declared all protestors Antifa; this is a move to legitimise killing civilians. Trump has defined the terms of engagement of the Civil War he is inciting, it is not Black vs White it is Fascist vs Antifascist.
